articles.author: Alex Lawler
articles.title: Oil resumes climb on large U.S. oil stocks drawdown - Reuters
articles.description: Oil rose above $75 a barrel on Wednesday, reaching its highest since late 2018, after an industry report on U.S. crude inventories reinforced views of a tightening market as travel picks up in Europe and North America.
articles.content: MELBOURNE, June 23 (Reuters) - Oil rose above $75 a barrel on Wednesday, reaching its highest since late 2018, after an industry report on U.S. crude inventories reinforced views of a tightening mark… [+1681 chars]
